identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Transform a basic maintenance system into a high-precision, elegant command center.
principles: Fusion: Industrial Utility x Swiss Precision
Content: Data is the hero. Noise is the enemy.
Contrast: High contrast for low-light factory environments.

headings.usage: All page titles, card headers, and metric values.

mono.usage: IDs, serial numbers, code snippets, technical data.

colors.mode_strategy: Dual Theme (Light/Dark) - Default to Dark for 'Control Room' feel.

primary.name: Safety Orange
primary.usage: Primary actions, active states, critical alerts.

surfaces.card_style: Flat background, 1px solid border (border-border), no shadow. Technical look.

buttons.style: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-md). High contrast.

cards.style: bg-card border border-border/50 rounded-lg overflow-hidden relative

badges.style: Solid color with 15% opacity background. 1px border matching color.

inputs.style: bg-background border-input focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-md h-10

navigation.sidebar: Fixed width (240px). Darker background than main content. Links highlight with a left border strip (tech-border).

textures.noise: opacity-20 pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 z-50 mix-blend-overlay

effects.glow: Use subtle drop-shadows on primary elements: drop-shadow-[0_0_8px_rgba(var(--primary),0.5)]
effects.tech_lines: Use 1px borders with low opacity to define structure.

login_background.description: Modern clean factory interior for login page background.

user_avatar.description: Professional engineer with tablet for user profile.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE TAILWIND CONFIG: Add the new colors (Safety Orange) and fonts (Barlow Condensed, Manrope).
2. REFACTOR LAYOUT: Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the dashboard. Use 'grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4' with specific spans.
3. ENHANCE UI: Apply the 'Tech Border' style to all cards. Remove default shadows, use borders.
4. TYPOGRAPHY: Replace all headings with Barlow Condensed. Use Manrope for body.
5. THEME: Ensure Dark Mode is the default or highly optimized. Use the 'Safety & Obsidian' palette.
6. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components to match the 'Industrial Precision' look (sharper corners, high contrast borders).
7. DATA-TESTID: Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid colors or subtle patterns.
Ensure high contrast for accessibility in industrial environments.
